Author: aneesh
Content:
well, the YC app asks at least 2 of these. so anyone who applies to YC thinks about them!

What do you understand about your business that other companies in it just don't get? (how so?)

Who are your competitors, and who might become competitors? Who do you fear most? (who are they?)

Content: Split the main screen so external links are on the left and internal links (polls, posts) are on the right.

Content: Matt, by upper percentile in math, where did that place you, i.e. SAT scores, etc?  I'm curious whether I have the math chops.  Also, is it entirely math and logic, or do you also need a good cold reading ability?

Author: aquateen
Content:
This is news.yc... have you read any of PG's thoughts on the value of ideas?

Here's an idea for bored_dev: Apparently, some people have a bizarre habit of highlighting the text as they read. Write a script that checks whether a user reads the entire text of, say, an EULA, or maybe an essay...
